{{Infobox Berry |name = Aguav |image = [[File:Aguav.png]] |caption = This Berry turns bitter toward the stem. The dainty flower it grows from doesn't absorb much sunlight. |growtime = 5m 50s |harvest = 17 berries |replant = 30% |points = 55 |flavor = {{!}} 0 {{!}} 0 {{!}} 0 {{!}} 15 {{!}} 0 }} '''Aguav''' is a type of [[Berries|Berry]]. It can be obtained by surrounding an empty plot with at least 25 Bitter points.

Berry |- | 0-40 || 40-170 || 170-220 || 220-350 || 350-700 |- | [[File:AllTreeSeed.png|50px]] || [[File:AllTreeSprout.png|50px]] || [[File:AguavTreeTaller.png|50px]] || [[File:AguavTreeBloom.png|50px]] || [[File:AguavTreeBerry.png|50px]] |}
